name: Crimson Hunter
text: The spirits demand recompense for crimes committed against the natural world, and they accept payment only in blood. You are their collector. You range the land to exact the price your enemies must pay for violating the world. You are a relentless hunter, ruthless in your mien, and efficient in your methods.

features.accurateArrow(11thLevel): You gain a +1 bonus to the attack rolls of your ranged basic attacks
features.crimsonHunter'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a +1 bonus to speed until the end of the encounter

flavorText: There is nowhere to hide, prey, for your blood stinks of your fear.
